content.content: Hi there! Let me introduce our crypto marketing agency ICODA - https://icoda.io/ and the ways how we could benefit you. Who are we? It is a cryptocurrency and blockchain agency that operates in different parts of the world. The company supplies its customers with turnkey marketing strategies and innovative technologies created according to the goals and peculiarities of autonomous organizations. We are a team of experts who accompany your firm and deliver crypto leads at all stages of platform creation and promotion. Our experience allows us to guarantee that your company will get high-professional comprehensive assistance and advancement. We at ICODA are always ready to help you. Book a free consultation right now, and our experts will find the most suitable way to promote your organization in the most effective way. The team will define every step carefully and meet the requirements. Check out our cases accessible here: https://icoda.io/cases/ Let’s get to know each other! We would like to propose a meeting to discuss how we can assist you in creating a DAO and building an effective strategy for it. Moreover, we’ll discuss the plan, costs as well as the timeline needed for it. Just drop me a line below. Kind regards, Danaya
content.GPT-summary: The post is an advertisement for a crypto marketing agency called ICODA. The author introduces the agency and its services, and invites the reader to book a free consultation to discuss how ICODA can assist in creating a DAO and building an effective strategy for it. The author also provides links to the agency's cases for reference.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Is this a Dapp on optimism or another blockchain or are you looking to fill out a grant proposal?
I agree with @FractalVisions . I cannot grasp the intention of the proposal.
This is too short! We need more details of the project and useful and valid applications of this project.
